name: Wages relative to price of energy
description: Labourer's daily wage relative to the price of 1 million British Thermal Units (BTUs), early 1700s

source.name: Allen, R. C. (2009)
source.dataPublishedBy: Allen, R. C. (2009), 'The British Industrial Revolution in Global Perspective, New Approaches to Economic and Social History', Cambridge University Press.
source.additionalInfo:
The bar chart shows the price of labour relative to the price of energy â€” specifically, the wages of building labourers divided by the price of 1 million BTU (British Thermal Units, a unit of energy equivalent to slightly more than 1,000 joules).

Data received directly from author via Kevin O'Rourke.
